content: I want to gift it to you. I have learned so much more just being next to you, and for that, I am really, really, really really, really grateful. Mm!
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: {A加油}I set out on a journey to grow stronger with Daikabutomaru. This <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit: Pawprint Sigil</style> records the paths that Daikabutomaru and I followed...!
